$schema: Configuration for Puerto Prompt Analyzer Hook v2.0

_comments.minScore: Minimum score threshold (0-100). Higher = more selective. Default: 8
_comments.maxRecommendations: Maximum number of plugin recommendations to show. Default: 3
_comments.cacheMinutes: How long to cache marketplace data in minutes. Default: 1
_comments.blacklist: Array of plugin names to never recommend. Example: ['plugin-name']
_comments.favoriteCategories: Array of categories to boost in recommendations. Example: ['frontend', 'backend']
_comments.showScores: Show relevance scores in output for debugging. Default: false
